page.title: 11EDUCATION
page.content: {SCHOOLS -}4{Primary}Schools in area- Bathford, Bathampton, Batheaston and Larkhall.King Edward's{Independent School.2 Schools in Bathford for children with{special}needs.Site of new Bathwick St.Mary's Primary School on A36 scheduled for opening in September 1986. KING EDWARD'S SCHOOL-main house in Victorian Italianate mansion.In July, 86 6th form boys will gain{work {experience}in accountancy, banking, dentistry, television, hotel management, estate agency and farming. {Local firms}are co-operating with the project. {SELF EMPLOYMENT PROJECT IN LARKHALL -funded by Manpower Services Commission and based in Brookleaze Buildings.10 week course for 16-25 year olds covering all aspects of setting up as self-employed.
